item.title: Argan Oil
item.description:
Infuse your hair with the ultimate in moisture and essential nutrients for a healthy finish like never before. Argan Oil offers a fresh take on hair that penetrates the cuticle, invigorating hair and nourishing the scalp.
Argan Oil’s plush formula is filled with generous amounts of Vitamin E and other beneficial fatty acids to be used as a hair and scalp treatment, a leave-in conditioner and a pre-styling product. Use it as a shine serum to calm flyaways or as a moisturizer to soften rough skin. Argan Oil is also known to prolong color treatments and aid in healthy hair growth.
Add this sweet smelling elixir to your hair care regimen for impressive results.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Arganics

item.title: Finishing Serum
item.description:
NuMe\'s Finishing Serum produces a polished shine and healthy glow that highlights any hair type or look.
This light, greaseless, and humidity resistant formula delivers a straight-up glossy finish. NuMe Finishing Serum protects your hair from environmental and physical stress as well as treating split ends and sealing hair with added, brilliant luster. Our advanced formula is made with lightweight silicones, a vitamin, and an antioxidant designed to tame flyaways and frizz.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Classic Hair Care

item.title: Hydro Punch Conditioner
item.description:
Natural Argan Oil from Morocco contains exceptionally high levels of essential fatty acids such as linoleic acid (omega-6), which counters dryness and loss of elasticity while preventing dull hair and split ends.
A powerful antioxidant agent mends damage caused by weather or harsh chemicals. Healthy Vitamin E helps to regain shine and a gorgeous, vibrant look.
Shea Butter, Chamomile and Aloe Juice penetrate hair leaving it nourished, refresh and hydrated for a glossy, weightless finish that lifts hair to new hydrated heights.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Hydro Punch

item.title: Hydro Punch Mask
item.description:
Apply pure power in just one use of the Hydro Punch Hydrating Mask. This gentle, but highly effective treatment goes way beyond moisture as it seals hair with Sweet Almond Oil, Grapeseed Oil and Mexican Jojoba Oil for essential nutrients that provide hair with the protection it needs to maintain its strength.
The Hydrating Mask begins at the scalp in order to benefit the source of healthy hair. Chamomile, Dead Sea Water, Sage and Evening Primrose Oil permeate the scalp to calm inflammation, dryness and increase blood flow.
Give your hair and scalp what it needs to stay looking naturally gorgeous.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Hydro Punch

item.title: Hydro Punch Oil
item.description:
The Hydrating Intense Oil increases hair’s moisture binding capacity and nourishes the hair follicle with advanced SERATIN-K Patented Technology, an active, protein based complex that supports hair’s natural functions.
Natural Argan Oil from Morocco contains exceptionally high levels of essential fatty acids such as linoleic acid (omega-6), which counters dryness and loss of elasticity while preventing dull hair and split ends.
Vitamin E helps to regain shine and a gorgeous, vibrant look while being a powerful antioxidant to protect hair against environmental pollutants.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Hydro Punch

item.title: Hydro Punch Shampoo
item.description:
We’ve put a day at the spa in your shampoo with the nutrient rich formula of the Pure Remedy Repair Shampoo. Water from the Dead Sea contains 27 minerals including zinc, calcium, iodine and potassium. These nutrients have known effects on dandruff, scalp stimulation and follicle health.
Shea Butter, Mexican Jojoba Oil and Vitamins balance hair’s moisture levels while Vitamin E drapes hair in protective antioxidants and restoring Omegas.
Create volume by lifting off buildup and manageability with conditioning Green Tea Extract.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Hydro Punch

item.title: Intense Renewal Mask
item.description: Renew hair with levels of moisture that will transform it to its healthiest and shiniest looking state. This indulgent formula contains powerful ingredients that instantly revive and rejuvenate. The Intense Renewal Mask provides deep conditioning that improves damaged, color treated or processed hair and restores hair’s natural shine and luster.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Classic Hair Care

item.title: Leave in Conditioner
item.description:
This special formula is a moisture boost in a lightweight formula. For thick, dry hair it plumps, de-frizzes and leaves hair soft and manageable. For fine hair it can be used in place of heavy conditioners for the right amount of moisture without weighing hair down.
An active Wheat Protein Complex and Panthenol vamp up hair strength and add thickness for lustrous hair styling that maintains its effectiveness all day.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Classic Hair Care

item.description: NuMe\'s Miracle Shine can make any hair type feel runway ready in just a couple of spritzes. Leave hair without a trace of frizz and static for hair empowered against humidity.

item.description:

Give tired hair new life with the awakening powers of Soy and Olive Fruit Oil.

item.description:
This luxurious cleansing formula adds softness and shine while penetrating the hair cuticle with a unique complex of soy protein designed to drastically improve hair\'s condition. Treat dry, damaged, colored or chemically treated locks to cuticle reinforcing, protective resurfacing and internal strengthening for incredible results.
The mild and moisturizing active ingredients in NuMe’s Moisturizing Shampoo gently dissolve dirt and buildup from the hair and scalp while binding moisture with Olive Extract.

item.description:
Your hair is instantly detangled as Shea Butter, Jojoba Oil and nutritious Olive Oil increase the moisture levels of hair. Obliphica Oil, a natural source rich in Vitamins C and E is known as one of the most enriched antioxidants for tired, damaged hair.
The naturally moisturizing qualities of this formula are proven to protect hair follicles, treat long-term damage and restore a vibrant, youthful quality to hair.
Pro Vitamin B5 binds moisture to hair while adding thickness and improving elasticity to help prevent against future breakage.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Pure Remedy

item.title: Pure Remedy Mask
item.description:
For a noticeable change in hair strength, improved manageability and softness, apply The Pure Remedy Repair Mask with its formula impacted with super-hydrators such as Shea Butter, Sweet Almond Oil and Grapeseed Oil. These oils not only moisturize, but deeply penetrate hair with reparative nutrients.
Amplify hair’s ability to protect itself with Vitamin E’s antioxidant power, and increase the scalp’s blood flow with Citrus Oil.
Give hair added grow power with Seratin-K, an active protein complex that aids in the regeneration process while boosting its ability to shine.

Replenish, repair and reinvigorate dry or damaged hair.

item.title: 3Sum Set Purple Zebra
item.description:
This trio has more things in common than looking great together. All three hot tools come fully dressed in ceramic that emits Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat into hair for a frizz and static free shine.
Comfortably use these hot tools as every day stylers with their smooth surfaces, lightweight bodies and ergonomic designs. They all heat up to 410° F in less than ten seconds with powerful MCH heating mechanisms.
Use the Tourmaline-infused, clipless 19mm to wrap hair into stunning curls.
Vintage straightens hair and allows its rounded barrels to create loose curls or flowing waves. Enjoy how the floating plates skim the length of hair at the molecular level with their unique alignment system. Use the dial setting to give your hair type the perfect dose of heat that starts from 140°F to 410°F .
There’s nothing missing from the Mini, not even the floating plates. Take this styler on the go or keep it local to effectively style bangs and short haircuts with no problem at all.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > 3-Sum

item.title: 3Sum Pink
item.description:
This trio has more things in common than looking great together. All three hot tools come fully dressed in ceramic that emits Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat Therapy into hair for a frizz and static free shine.
Comfortably use these hot tools as everyday stylers with their smooth surfaces, lightweight bodies and ergonomic designs. They all heat up to 410° F in less than ten seconds with powerful MCH heating mechanisms.
Use the Tourmaline infused, clipless 19mm wand to wrap hair into stunning curls.
Vintage straightens hair and allows its rounded barrels to create loose curls or flowing waves. Enjoy how the floating plates skim the length of hair at the molecular level with their unique alignment system. Use the dial setting to give your hair type the perfect dose of heat that starts from 140°F and goes to 410°F.

item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > 3-Sum

item.title: Lustrum
item.description:
Welcome to a world of options. The Lustrum is a styling tool with five very different curling wand attachments. Each ceramic heat barrel is infused with Tourmaline for frizz free, curly hairstyles.
The 19mm barrel helps to create sweetheart tendrils that have superior hold and long lasting shine. The 25mm is our most popular sized heat barrel. It creates intricate curls for updos or free flowing volume. Wave hair up, flip it out or lay down some serious volume with our 32mm barrel. The Reverse gives you consistent mermaid waves with ease. Starting from 13mm from the tip to 25mm at the base, Reverse’s shape facilitates the progression needed for flowing ripples and fascinating hair. Pearl offers otherworldly versatility. Its interesting shape constructs shiny, wild curls that could easily be mistaken for your own natural twist and turns.
Awesome technology heats up your wand to the perfect 410°F setting in mere seconds. Tourmaline infused ceramic evenly distributes infrared heat and negative ions into hair for less styling time and a shiny finish. The included thermal glove gives you full access to this clip free curling wand.
The ergonomic handle boasts an LED light that lets you know when it’s time to style. A 360° swivel cord gives you free flowing control over your curls while dual voltage allows easy power transitioning wherever you are.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Lustrum

item.title: Curl Jam Pink zebra
item.description:
NuMe’s Curl Jam is the joining of two versatile styling tools that give you ways to curl, straighten or wave your hair into hot, healthy looking style. Tourmaline infused ceramic graces both the floating plates of the Fashionista Flat Iron and Tri-fect, a curling wand with three interchangeable heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm. Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat Conditioning balances hair’s structure and seals in its own natural moisture for proven frizz free shine.
Both tools have advanced heating mechanisms that take them to 410°F in seconds. With sleek grips and ergonomic handling, everyday styling can be done comfortably with this lightweight duo.
The Fashionista uses 600% more Negative Ion Therapy that hits every strand of hair with its precision engineered alignment.
Tri-fect has an effortless locking system that allows you to quickly go from one wand size to the next while remaining secure for the curling ride.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Curl Jam

item.title: Pentacle
item.description:
This wand is more than just a wand. It’s the largest clipless curling wand on the market and it’s meant to give you the biggest curls your hair has ever seen. This hair story doesn’t end here. With the simple click of a button, Pentacle unlocks and offers you the ability to give yourself large vintage waves or the means to crimp your hair into a cascade of style. Negative Ion Power and Infrared Heat Technology give frizz free shine to whichever style you choose.
The ergonomic handle prepares you to take on massive amounts of style with a firm grip. Dial heat settings go from 140 °F to 410°F in seconds and an LED light lets you know that the advanced MCH heating mechanism and built in dual voltage converter are working to keep you styling wherever you want to plug in the 7’9” power cord. Included is a heat-resistant glove. Bring dual action precision to your hair for styling options that take you to the pinnacle of the hottest hair effects.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Pentacle

item.title: Premium Titan 3 Black
item.description:
Three lightweight, interchangeable heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm, made of 100% pure Titanium radiate Infrared Heat Therapy and Negative Ion Technology deep within your hair cuticle to give you a variety of lasting curls and three times the shine. Quickly transition through big curls, little curls and curls that are just right with the quick release button that makes changing wand size a snap.
The soft touch finish and ergonomic handle keeps this lightweight wand in hand and looking chic. The modern digital display lets you know when your wand is at its full power of 392°F with a color changing LED light.

item.title: Tri-Fect
item.description:
Three Tourmaline infused ceramic heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm put Negative Ion Therapy and Infrared Heat Technology in the palm of your hand to seal in moisture and create sleek, frizz free shine that lasts all night long.
An improved heating mechanism powers your wand in seconds to the perfect salon standard of 410°F.
Tri-Fect offers a locking system that safely locks to keep your interchangeable heat barrels in place while you create effortless styles. It\'s simple to unlock; with just a quick click, release and change your barrel for access to a different styling size.
An added LED light lets you know when Tri-fect is in style mode. Flip on the power switch for almost instantaneous heat activation and faster styling time. Tri-fect also comes complete with a heat-resistant glove to let you move through hair with ease. Grab hold of Tri-fect’s ergonomic handle to create a secure, but relaxed grip while the 360° swivel cord moves with you for ultimate freedom in styling.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Tri-Fect

item.title: Thermal Defense
item.description: This lightweight and non-greasy formula takes excess heat and optimizes the effectiveness you get from styling, leaving hair with added body and shine. item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Hair Care > Classic Hair Care

item.title: 13mm Curling Wand Black
item.description:
Mold hair into sexy, frizz-free curls with renowned Tourmaline Technology in your choice of shape or size. Tourmaline infused ceramic permeates hair with Negative Ion Technology to help balance the hair structure. Infrared Heat Conditioning seals moisture back into hair for powerful shine.
The clipless designs and ergonomic handles make your styling time lightweight and comfortable. Simply flip on the power switch and in mere seconds your wand is at the beauty standard of 410°F with an advanced MCH heating mechanism.
Choose from four different wand sizes in 13mm, 19mm, 25mm and 32mm in diameter for a full range of curls. Looking for something a bit more unique? Go with the Reverse or Pearl Wands for mermaid waves or natural looking curls.

item.title: Jenni Rivera Styling Iron Black
item.description: Do you crave a beautifully tempered style? The Silhouette Ceramic Iron is ideal for all hair types, combining temperature controlled, 100% ceramic plates with a comfortable soft-touch finish. Kiss your hair with the gentle moisture-locking technology that only NuMe can offer. The Silhouette incorporates the original ceramic iron design into a unique composition of its own. Its 1 1/4 inch plates use far infrared heat and negative ion technology to ensure that your hair is precisely groomed to your liking. The rounded barrels, variable temperature control, and floating ceramic plates are guaranteed to provide you with the versatility you\'ve always wanted in a single hairstyling tool. Treat your tresses to professional hair care with a NuMe Silhouette in Black, Purple, Pink, Hot Pink, or Soft Touch Black. Whether you want to tame wild hair or give dull locks a wildly curly flair, the Silhouette will give you style that\'s the apple of everyone\'s desire.

item.title: MegaStar Black
item.description:
One-inch, 100% pure ceramic floating plates with an Infrared Heat Light Beam have been made 25% longer and are precision engineered to perfectly align with hair at the molecular level. The dual action of the Tourmaline infused ceramic and an Ion Accelerator permeate hair with 1000% Negative Ion Technology.
The MegaStar comes equipped with a soft touch finish. A digital display with a backlit LED light and advanced controls give your hair type options from 140°F to 450°F. The rapid heating components heat your iron in seconds and a 30-minute automatic shut off timer never lets your iron hang out in the heat alone. The rounded barrel design will make creating curls and waves just as easy as the MegaStar’s straightening effects.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > Mega Star

item.title: Special Edition Curling Wand: 19mm: Black
item.description:
Tourmaline is a semi-precious stone that offers 600% more Negative Ion Therapy to neutralize electron loss and balance the hair structure for smooth, daring looks. Treat hair to invigorating style that actually helps improve the look and feel of damaged hair.
Throughout our extensive research working with stylists, engineers and scientists from around the world, we at NuMe, have found the perfect heat setting. All of our Special Edition Wands heat up in mere seconds to 410° F with our new heating mechanism.
NuMe Curling Wands are now outfitted in new ergonomic handles for an effortless grip. The sleek design features a power switch, LED light and 360° swivel cord for a free flowing style session.
All wands are dual voltage and come with a heat-resistant glove to get a cool hold on your hot style.
Great for shorter hairstyles, tighter curls or brushed out volume, the 19mm creates wild spirals or tiny tendrils. The 25mm barrel size is a NuMe favorite and is amazing at delivering vibrant, natural looking curls or sexy waves that hold all day.
The 35mm is a thick, flat wand that creates waves of wonder and retro glam style like no other. It comes engineered with a mini clip and cool touch tip to help you maneuver around the heat with accurate speed. A heat stand keeps your wand lifted to protect your surfaces and to reserve the power of the 35mm for your hair only.
Reverse will bring mermaid waves that last all day. Wrap your hair around the Reverse and always have a perfect curl in seconds. Go from 18mm to 25mm from tip to base with this wand, which offers waves upon waves to each piece of hair you curl.
Pearl offers wild looking curls. We’ve added a cool touch tip and a mini clip to secure hair for quick and effortless curling. The added built-in stand reserves heat for your hair and not for your countertops.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Special Edition Curling Wand

item.title: Signature Magic Wand 25mm Blue
item.description:
The Magic Wands miraculously keep curls where you want them with 100% pure Titanium, which retains and evenly distributes heat for proven healthier styling and unbeatable shine. The Magic Wand hypnotizes curls with powerful Negative Ion Therapy to lock in style with hair’s own natural moisture. These clipless wands are perfect for fine hair’s special occasions and professional styling. Thick, coarse hair is mesmerized into smooth twists and turns with the curls dreams are made of.
Titanium is as strong as steel, but seemingly lighter than air. Grab on to the soft touch finish with one hand and use the included heat-resistant glove for a comfortable grasp on your style session with the other.
The digital display setting and LED light keep you aware of your power and when it’s time to cast a spell over style.
Available in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm meant for all types of curly hairstyle and hair lengths.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Magic Wand

item.title: Signature Dryer Black
item.description:
Get in, get styled and get ready for the compliments. Can you imagine frizz free shine in 40% less time? With a ceramic grill, Negative Ion Technology and Infrared HeatTherapy, it is totally possible. The Signature dries hair from the inside out to seal your cuticle with hair’s own natural moisture.
The soft touch finish doesn’t just give this dryer a hot look of its own, but adds protection from dropping and scratching.
Give every hair type the perfect amount of heat at the perfect speed with two fan speeds and three heat settings. Shoot on some cool with the cool shot button to freeze frame style.
The Signature also comes with two heat concentrators to help guide heat in the direction of the hair cuticle to maintain the hair structure, limit spit ends and keep healthy looking style.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Hair Dryers > Signature Ionic Dryer

Mold hair into sexy, frizz-free curls with renowned Tourmaline Technology in your choice of shape or size. Tourmaline infused ceramic permeates hair with Negative Ion Technology to help balance the hair structure. Infrared Heat Conditioning seals moisture back into hair for powerful shine.
The clipless designs and ergonomic handles make your styling time lightweight and comfortable. Simply flip on the power switch and in mere seconds your wand is at the beauty standard of 410°F with an advanced MCH heating mechanism.
Choose from four different wand sizes in 13mm, 19mm, 25mm and 32mm in diameter for a full range of curls. Looking for something a bit more unique? Go with the Reverse or Pearl Wands for mermaid waves or natural looking curls.
Included are the little extras that let you keep your focus on the style such as a heat-resistant glove and a 360° swivel chord.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Classic Curling Wand

item.title: Petite Blue
item.description:
The portable size of Petite packs every inch of its 100% Tourmaline infused ceramic plates with the power of negative Ions and Infrared Heat Technology that radiates heat evenly for minimized styling time and a smooth, sleek finish.
Floating plates, precision engineered alignment and a rounded barrel design curl, wave and straighten most any hair lengths with ease.
Complete with a built in dual voltage converter and 360° swivel power cord, Petite carries the same powerful technology as our leading full size flat irons.
Smaller than the Vintage, but larger than the Mini, the Petite is fit for your traveling needs with dual voltage. Take your style with you wherever you go without compromising the quality of a NuMe salon-grade flat iron.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > Petite

item.title: Vintage Black
item.description:
The Vintage Iron\'s 100% solid ceramic plates provide precise and even infrared heat distribution, eliminating the chipping and hot spots that are typical of conventional flat irons. Cutting-edge technology enables each hair cuticle to be infused with negative ions, sealing in healthy moisture for that irresistible shine.
The rounded barrel and overall ergonomic design make styling simple so you can maneuver around seductively smooth locks, voluptuous waves or flirtatious curls with the flick of your wrist. Its precision engineered, 1 1/4 inch floating plates use NuMe\'s unique alignment system to ensure ideal contact between your hair and the temperature controlled ceramic plates.
Dial settings go from 140°F to 410°F in no time at all to allow styling at a moment’s notice.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > Vintage

item.title: Signature InVogue Tourmaline Black
item.description:
Saying that the IN●VOGUE is meant for all hair types is the ultimate understatement. This flat iron comes in pure 100% Titanium for thick, coarse hair, professional styling use or for the special occasions of fine to normal hair divas. In need of an everyday hair styler? Pick the Tourmaline infused floating plates for your dose of chic sleek. Extra long plates help long hairstyles get sleek hair faster and a thin barrel design lets short haircuts be a part of the action too. It does more than just straighten. The rounded barrel design lets you curl or wave hair into gorgeous shapes.
A digital display and backlit LED light show you when you’re at the perfect temperature for your hair type in both Fahrenheit and Celsius. Watch how fast the powerful MCH heater takes IN●VOGUE from 170°F to 450°F in less than 10 seconds.
The ethereal, soft touch finish not only helps you get a good grasp over your styling session, it protects your styler from scratches and scrapes while looking hot.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > In Vogue

item.title: Classic Holder
item.description: It’s time to lock and load with The Classic Holder. Four built-in suction cups have been added to this innovative structure to adhere to any smooth surface and limit knocking over your precious stylers. Create more space by mounting your holder on your mirror or wall. These shock and heat-resistant holders come complete with ventilation to keep your wands from heat condensation, which doesn’t bother your holder because it’s water-proof. Easy to clean and easy to store, NuMe’s Classic holder is the perfect accessory to hold tools up to 1.75 inches wide and to add that little extra to your style station.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Holders > Classic Holders

item.title: Thermal Pouch
item.description: The NuMe Thermal Pouch is as useful as it is stylish. Slip your iron into the pouch for safe traveling and use the heat-resistant guard to protect your work surface while you style. No matter the environment, the durable design of this Mylar lined pouch will endure continued use while still looking hot. Its lightweight, easy to clean design can hold up to two stylers to keep things simple and convenient.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Thermal Pouch

item.title: Pro Holders
item.description:
Enhance your work surface with the perfect accessory. With its extra-wide base, the NuMe Professional Iron Holder will keep your tools conveniently on hand and out of the way.
This shock and heat resistant holder has a good grasp on style. Because it’s equipped with suction cups and can lock onto any smooth surface for vertical mounting, it makes space saving a snap.
Store irons up to 1.5 inches wide while you get ready or when you’re ready to go and want to leave your
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Holders > Pro Holders

item.title: Styling Comb
item.description:
This salon-grade tool parts hair and grabs locks with swift ease and precision. Use the separating arm to move hair the way you want it before clasping down your comb to cut through tangles.
Made with heat-resistant material to ensure a protected, long lasting tool that is ideal for heat styling.
Anti-static materials work with your hot tools to create a sleek finish on style. Follow with your flat iron to sooth hair into locks of love.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Brushes & Combs > Styling Combs

item.title: Round Brush
item.description: A ceramic coating and air-flow vents help to emit Negative Ion Therapy to hair for accelerated drying time, and to eliminate damaging hot spots on the barrel surface. The ceramic inner coils help to produce an incredible, static-free texture while maintaining evenly-dispersed heat conductivity for healthy looking, radiant results.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Brushes & Combs

item.title: 3 Sum
item.description:
This trio has more things in common than looking great together. All three hot tools come fully dressed in ceramic that emits Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat Therapy into hair for a frizz and static free shine.
Comfortably use these hot tools as everyday stylers with their smooth surfaces, lightweight bodies and ergonomic designs. They all heat up to 410° F in less than ten seconds with powerful MCH heating mechanisms.
Use the Tourmaline infused, clipless 19mm wand to wrap hair into stunning curls.
Vintage straightens hair and allows its rounded barrels to create loose curls or flowing waves. Enjoy how the floating plates skim the length of hair at the molecular level with their unique alignment system. Use the dial setting to give your hair type the perfect dose of heat that starts from 140°F and goes to 410°F.
There’s nothing missing from the Mini, not even the floating plates. Take this styler on the go or keep it local to effectively style bangs and short haircuts with no problem.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > 3-Sum

item.title: Curl Jam
item.description:
NuMe’s Curl Jam is the joining of two versatile styling tools that give you ways to curl, straighten or wave your hair into hot, healthy looking style. Tourmaline infused ceramic graces both the floating plates of the Fashionista Flat Iron and Tri-fect, a curling wand with three interchangeable heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm. Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat Conditioning balances hair’s structure and seals in its own natural moisture for proven frizz free shine.
Both tools have advanced heating mechanisms that take them to 410°F in seconds. With sleek grips and ergonomic handling, everyday styling can be done comfortably with this lightweight duo.
The Fashionista uses 600% more Negative Ion Therapy that hits every strand of hair with its precision engineered alignment.
Tri-fect has an effortless locking system that allows you to quickly go from one wand size to the next while remaining secure for the curling ride.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Curl Jam

item.title: Titan 3
item.description:
Three lightweight, interchangeable heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm, made of 100% pure Titanium radiate Infrared Heat Therapy and Negative Ion Technology deep within your hair cuticle to give you a variety of lasting curls and three times the shine. Quickly transition through big curls, little curls and curls that are just right with the quick release button that makes changing wand size a snap.
The soft touch finish and ergonomic handle keeps this lightweight wand in hand and looking chic. The modern digital display lets you know when your wand is at its full power of 392°F with a color changing LED light.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Titan 3

item.title: MegaStar
item.description:
One-inch, 100% pure ceramic floating plates with an Infrared Heat Light Beam have been made 25% longer and are precision engineered to perfectly align with hair at the molecular level. The dual action of the Tourmaline infused ceramic and an Ion Accelerator permeate hair with 1000% Negative Ion Technology.
The MegaStar comes equipped with a soft touch finish. A digital display with a backlit LED light and advanced controls give your hair type options from 140°F to 450°F. The rapid heating components heat your iron in seconds and a 30-minute automatic shut off timer never lets your iron hang out in the heat alone. The rounded barrel design will make creating curls and waves just as easy as the MegaStar’s straightening effects.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > Mega Star

item.description:
Mold hair into sexy, frizz-free curls with renowned Tourmaline Technology in your choice of shape or size. Tourmaline infused ceramic permeates hair with Negative Ion Technology to help balance the hair structure. Infrared Heat Conditioning seals moisture back into hair for powerful shine.
The clipless designs and ergonomic handles make your styling time lightweight and comfortable. Simply flip on the power switch and in mere seconds your wand is at the beauty standard of 410°F with an advanced MCH heating mechanism.

item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Classic Curling Wand

item.title: Magic Wands
item.description:
The Magic Wands miraculously keep curls where you want them with 100% pure Titanium which retains and evenly distributes heat for proven, healthier styling and unbeatable shine. The Magic Wand hypnotizes curls with powerful Negative Ion Therapy to lock in style with hair’s own natural moisture. These clipless wands are perfect for fine hair’s special occasions and professional styling. Thick, course hair is mesmerized into smooth twists and turns with the curls dreams are made of.
Titanium is as strong as steel but seemingly lighter than air. Grab on to the soft touch finish with one hand and use the included heat-resistant glove for a comfortable grasp on your style session.
The digital display setting and LED light keep you aware of your power and when it’s time to cast a spell over style.
Available in 19mm, 25mm, and 32mm meant for all types of curly hairstyle and hair lengths.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Magic Wand

item.title: Special Edition Wands
item.description:
Tourmaline is a semi-precious stone that offers 600% more Negative Ion Therapy to neutralize electron loss and balance the hair structure for smooth, daring looks. Treat hair to invigorating style that actually helps improve the look and feel of damaged hair.
Throughout our extensive research working with stylists, engineers and scientists from around the world, we at NuMe, have found the perfect heat setting. All of our Special Edition Wands heat up in mere seconds to 410° F with our new heating mechanism.
NuMe Curling Wands are now outfitted in new ergonomic handles for an effortless grip. The sleek design features a power switch, LED light and 360° swivel cord for a free flowing style session.
All wands are dual voltage and come with a heat-resistant glove to get a cool hold on your hot style.
Great for shorter hairstyles, tighter curls or brushed out volume, the 19mm creates wild spirals or tiny tendrils. The 25mm barrel size is a NuMe favorite and is amazing at delivering vibrant, natural looking curls or sexy waves that hold all day.
The 35mm is a thick, flat wand that creates waves of wonder and retro glam style like no other. It comes engineered with a mini clip and cool touch tip to help you maneuver around the heat with accurate speed. A heat stand keeps your wand lifted to protect your surfaces and to reserve the power of the 35mm for your hair only.
Reverse will bring mermaid waves that last all day. Wrap your hair around the Reverse and always have a perfect curl in seconds. Go from 18mm to 25mm from tip to base with this wand, which offers waves upon waves to each piece of hair you curl.
Pearl offers wild looking curls. We’ve added a cool touch tip and a mini clip to secure hair for quick and effortless curling. The added built-in stand reserves heat for your hair and not for your countertops.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Special Edition Curling Wand

Features-
Our improved Tri-Fect offers a new lock system that safely locks to keep your interchangeable heat barrels in place while you create. With just a quick click, it’s simple to unlock, release and change your barrel for access to a different styling size.
Added LED light lets you know when Tri-fect is in style mode. Flip on the power switch for almost instantaneous heat activation and faster styling time. Tri-fect also comes complete with a heat resistant glove to let you move through hair with ease.
Ergonomic handle helps create a secure but relaxed grip while the 360° swivel cord moves with you for ultimate freedom in styling.
19mm
Something so little never created such big voluminous hair. This barrel size can create multiple tight and tiny tendrils for the look of childlike innocence or brush and tease it out to release your inner lioness.
25mm
Construct classic looks for everyday polished curls with our most popular barrel size. Effortless elegance in 25 mm.
32mm
Drop dead gorgeous waves and full volume hair are yours with the 32mm barrel. This is the perfect size to create sultry soft curls and give long hair a glorious new identity.

item.title: Diffuser
item.description:
The Tourmaline infused Ionic Diffuser radiates Infrared Heat Conditioning through 24 air prongs deep into the hair cortex to dry hair from the inside out while locking in hair’s own natural moisture. Negative Ion Therapy neutralizes electrons, eliminates frizz and creates healthy looking shine.
The air prongs are like 24 little fingers that gently massage hair up to add instantaneous volume and define locks without the excess heat. This durable material and innovative design promises many years of effective and gorgeous results. br /> This Diffuser is intended for the Signature Dryer only.
item.g:product_type: Hair Care & Accessores > Accessories > Diffuser

item.title: Jenni Rivera Styling Iron
item.description:
¡Que fantástica! NuMe’s exclusive Jenni Rivera Collection presents the technologically innovative Jenni Iron, made with 100% solid ceramic plates and a delicate soft-touch finish. Look as superstar-ready as this diva deliciosa with silky smooth locks, luscious waves, or ravenous curls.
Style it smart with infrared heat and temperature control, ensuring beautifully and evenly tempered hair for any occasion. Our negative ion technology locks in healthy moisture for luminous shine and less heat damage, so you can style guilt-free. Amp up the luxury with the Jenni Iron’s sleek, chic design and non-slip finish, all wrapped up in NuMe’s famous ergonomic design. Choose from Fuscia, Blue, Gold, Purple or Black to spice up your hairstyling tools.
Don\'t miss out on this special collection, exclusively offered by yours truly. With NuMe\'s Jenni Iron, your sexy hair will have everyone screaming, "¡Ay, ay, ay!"

item.title: Curl Jam Black
item.description:
NuMe’s Curl Jam is the joining of two versatile styling tools that gives you ways to curl, straighten, or wave your hair into hot, healthy looking style. Tourmaline-infused ceramic graces both the floating plates of the Fashionista Flat Iron and Tri-fect, a curling wand with three interchangeable heat barrels in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm. Negative Ion Technology and Infrared heat balances hair’s structure and seal in its own natural moisture for proven frizz free shine.
Both tools have an advanced heating mechanism that takes them to 410°F in seconds. With sleek grips and ergonomic handling, everyday styling can be done comfortably with this lightweight duo.
The Fashionista uses 600% more Negative Ion Therapy that hit every strand of hair with its precision engineered alignment.
Tri-fect has an effortless locking system that allows you to quickly go from one wand size to the next while remaining secure for the curling ride.
item.g:product_type: Styling Sets > Curl Jam

item.title: Premium Dryer Turquoise
item.description:
Get in, get styled and get ready for the compliments. Can you imagine frizz free shine in 40% less time? With a ceramic grill, Negative Ion Technology and Infrared HeatTherapy, it is totally possible. The Signature dries hair from the inside out to seal your cuticle with hair’s own natural moisture.
The soft touch finish doesn’t just give this dryer a hot look of its own, but adds protection from dropping and scratching.
Give every hair type the perfect amount of heat at the perfect speed with two fan speeds and three heat settings. Shoot on some cool with the cool shot button to freeze frame style.
The Signature also comes with two heat concentrators to help guide heat in the direction of the hair cuticle to maintain the hair structure, limit spit ends and keep healthy looking style.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Hair Dryers > Signature Ionic Dryer

item.title: Premium InVogue Turquoise
item.description:
Saying that the IN●VOGUE is meant for all hair types is the ultimate understatement. This flat iron comes in pure 100% Titanium for thick, coarse hair, professional styling use or for the special occasions of fine to normal hair divas. In need of an everyday hair styler? Pick the Tourmaline infused floating plates for your dose of chic sleek. Extra long plates help long hairstyles get sleek hair faster and a thin barrel design lets short haircuts be a part of the action too. It does more than just straighten. The rounded barrel design lets you curl or wave hair into gorgeous shapes.
A digital display and backlit LED light show you when you’re at the perfect temperature for your hair type in both Fahrenheit and Celsius. Watch how fast the powerful MCH heater takes IN●VOGUE from 170°F to 450°F in less than 10 seconds.
The ethereal, soft touch finish not only helps you get a good grasp over your styling session, it protects your styler from scratches and scrapes while looking hot.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Flat Irons > In Vogue

item.title: Premium Magic Wand 19mm Turquoise
item.description:
The Magic Wands miraculously keep curls where you want them with 100% pure Titanium, which retains and evenly distributes heat for proven healthier styling and unbeatable shine. The Magic Wand hypnotizes curls with powerful Negative Ion Therapy to lock in style with hair’s own natural moisture. These clipless wands are perfect for fine hair’s special occasions and professional styling. Thick, coarse hair is mesmerized into smooth twists and turns with the curls dreams are made of.
Titanium is as strong as steel, but seemingly lighter than air. Grab on to the soft touch finish with one hand and use the included heat-resistant glove for a comfortable grasp on your style session with the other.
The digital display setting and LED light keep you aware of your power and when it’s time to cast a spell over style.
Available in 19mm, 25mm and 32mm meant for all types of curly hairstyle and hair lengths.
item.g:product_type: Styling Tools > Curling Wands > Magic Wand

item.title: MegaStar Purple
item.description:
One-inch, 100% pure ceramic floating plates with an Infrared Heat Light Beam have been made 25% longer and are precision engineered to perfectly align with hair at the molecular level. The dual action of the Tourmaline infused ceramic and an Ion Accelerator permeate hair with 1000% Negative Ion Technology.
The MegaStar comes equipped with a soft touch finish. A digital display with a backlit LED light and advanced controls give your hair type options from 140°F to 450°F. The rapid heating components heat your iron in seconds and a 30-minute automatic shut off timer never lets your iron hang out in the heat alone. The rounded barrel design will make creating curls and waves just as easy as the MegaStar’s straightening effects.

item.title: Style By Numbers
item.description:
The Titan 3 and the Silhouette Flat Iron are not your average hot tools. Both stylers deliver Negative Ion Therapy and Infrared Heat Conditioning deep into hair for frizz free style. Their powers combined give you options that curl, straighten and wave with ease.
The Titan 3 offers three 100% pure Titanium heat barrels that will lock curls into place in sizes 19mm, 25mm and 32mm.
Use the digital settings to take you from 122°F to 392°F in no time at all with its powerful MCH heating mechanism. The soft touch finish and ergonomic handle help you get a grip and protect your wand from scrapes and scratches.
Lock and load in a flash with a quick release button that lets you effortlessly switch your style size. Diffuse heat with the included thermal protecting glove to keep you moving right along.
Silhouette has its own roster of styling assets with a rounded barrel design and 100% pure ceramic floating plates that align to hair at the molecular level so that you can curl, straighten and wave in the shine.
An ergonomic handle and textured grip keep a strong hold over your look and make everyday styling comfortable.
Go from 140°F to 410°F in seconds for hot style right when you want it. Simply turn it on and move the dial to the desired heat setting for your hair type.
item.g:product_type: Flash Sales > Style By Numbers

item.title: sweet
item.description:
The Magic Wand and the IN●VOGUE come complete with gorgeous soft touch finishes for added protection and grip, digital display settings with backlit LED lights and temperatures that go from 170°F to 450°F in mere seconds. Both tools penetrate hair with Negative Ion Technology and Infrared Heat Conditioning.
The Magic Wand’s clipless design comes in three 100% pure Titanium curing sizes (19mm, 25mm and 32mm) to benefit short hairstyles, medium length locks and long haircuts. It comes with its very own heat-resistant glove and has a 360° swivel chord.
The IN●VOGUE has some surprises all its own. It doesn’t just come in Titanium; it also comes in Tourmaline infused ceramic. Titanium is amazing for thick, coarse hair, professional styling and for those special occasions where all hair types need top notch style. Tourmaline is amazing for all hair types and every day styling.
item.g:product_type: Flash Sales > High Style High Tech

item.title: Classic Sweethearts
item.description:
The Classic Sweethearts are tried and true NuMe stylers that offer proven shine and lasting style. Both tools deliver negative ions with deeply penetrating infrared heat. These everyday stylers will be there to keep you looking hot for a long time to come.
The Vintage Flat Iron uses 100% pure ceramic to sooth hair into a sleek finish. Its rounded barrel design gives you the ability to create loose curls or beachy waves.
Complete with dial settings that go from 140°F to 410°F, an ergonomic design and floating plates that align to the molecular level of hair for limited wand passage.
The Classic Wand Collection lays out six clipless choices each with its own shape or size. Pick wands from 13mm to 32mm or get wild with Pearl or mermaid waves from Reverse.
Wrap your fingers around the ergonomic handle and handle the heat with the included thermal protecting glove.
